topic.title: Info about ZERONET
topic.body:
Hello, i have few questions about ZERONET. (i'm a new happy user, i love it!)
- I opened a ZeroBlog. to make it available online is needed that the ZeroNet Bundle (the software i run on my pc to visit ZeroNet) must run always, or is rest available also if i shutdown the pc sometimes?
- It's not pretty clear how ZeroMail works. Why i can't delete/modify contacts list? Why i can't delete reveived mails?

Thank you very much for reply

topic.title: The Darknet Project landed ZeroNet! Enjoy!
topic.body:
This is the Blog: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1QEPrBH4sC9GrtFBwPDMTXN4R55WkdxPS1

For who don't know what's the fucking darknet project don't worry. In blog you'll find all info about us.
Thank you for visiting it, if you can, peer it :)
